meanings.def: a person who gives money and support to artists and writers
examples: Frederick the Great was the patron of many artists.
He was a great patron of the arts and helped to establish the Baltimore Museum.

meanings.def: a famous person who supports an organization such as a charity and whose name is used in the advertisements, etc. for the organization
examples: the official patron of the college
The Duchess of Cornwall is to be patron of the new Unicorn Theatre for Children.

meanings.def: a person who uses a particular shop, restaurant, etc.
examples: Patrons are requested not to smoke.
